name: After Stonewall
description:
At the end of the 1960s, the Stonewall Riots were a turning point in civil rights for the LGBTQ community and the fight for social justice in the modern world. 

In this arcade-like game, you'll spread the word to as many people as possible to make the protests a reality. Explain your cause to the people, but be careful — not everyone is that open-minded to change, so they might try to stop you.

Created for the Dream Arcade Archive Game Jam.

Game design and 2D art/animation: Eli Dávila.

Game design and programming: Francis Liñán.
